description:
Stunning heritage fully renovated townhouse in Shaughnessy, overlooking Vancouver Lawn Tennis & Badminton Club and steps away from popular shops and stores of South Granville. Spacious and bright this home features hardwood floors, Chef's kitchen, granite countertops, S/S appliances, eating area and pantry and a large living/dining room with crown mouldings. One bathroom on main floor and back door leading to private out-door space.

On the second floor you will find high vaulted ceilings, generous master bedroom with walk-in closet and ensuite, large second bedroom, and full bathroom plus office or baby's room. Fully secured underground parking with FOB access and storage locker and bike room in underground parkade. This townhouse is available for rent March 1, 2020 and rental rate is $4,500/monthly. For further inquiry and viewing, please contact by email, or text/call  show contact info
.

description:
Bright, beautiful, brand new 3 bedroom luxury townhouse for rent. This rental unit is located at 7278 Adera Street, in prime Kerrisdale neighborhood on the Westside of Vancouver. Features include engineered hardwood flooring, carpeted bedroom floors, radiant in-floor heating and air conditioning. Luxury features include high end designer appliances, gas cooktop, built-in wall oven, dishwasher, built-in microwave oven, and in-suite washer/dryer. Common area includes access to exercise room, heated outdoor swimming pool, hot tub and entertainment room. 

School nearby: Dr. R.E. McKechnie Elementary, Maple Grove Elementary, Magee Secondary 


Monthly rent includes utility. Secure parking stall and 1 storage locker is included. Plenty of street parking available on Adera street.

Price are negotiable. Any question feel free to contact.

description:
Available Immediately! Please email or text to arrange an appointment.

Three levels. Comprising of 5 bedrooms (2 upstairs, 2 main floor, 1 downstairs), 3.5 washrooms, balcony on main floor, a garden and electronic retractable back gate. Located steps away from the Arbutus Greenway walking trail that leads all the way to Kits Beach. 

Charming home located on quiet part of West Boulevard Kerrisdale neighborhood.  This five bedroom, three bathroom (three level) home is located across the street from Arbutus Greenway walking trail, few feet from Choices Market, with plenty of bus routes for easy access to UBC, downtown Vancouver, and the airport.  Steps away from the Arbutus bus line. Located minutes from nearby Bean Around the World, Starbucks, banks, supermarket, restaurants etc. School Catchment: Dr. RE McKechnie Elementary School, McGee Secondary, and close to Kerrisdale Elementary School, Point Grey Secondary, also close to St. George's School, Crofton House School, York House School and Little Flower Academy. 

The home is equipped with updates (hardwood floors/dimmer lights) , garburator, alarm system, balcony on the main floor, a back garden, car ports in the back, electronic retractable back gate, and plenty of parking on the front.  From the upper home suite, enjoy beautiful sunsets from the west facing deck, and garden on this large lot (40x120 lot).  

The middle and upper home is equipped with four bedrooms, two bathrooms and a room with a sink, living room, kitchen, balcony on the main floor, laundry located downstairs. 

The basement part of home has a separate entrance, and is equipped with one living space, one half bathroom, workshop, and a attached garage. Extra fridge located downstairs. 

Pets may be allowed with references and owner approval. No smoking.  Must provide three references (employer, landlord, and other) and proof of employment and recent paystub.  

Available ASAP.  Feb. 1 2020 for $4500.

description:
Please call Jacob at  show contact info
 to book a showing.
This is fully a fully furnished residence. 
Belpark has a spacious lobby with an on-site concierge to greet you in your preferred language. Its an elegant entry to your beautiful Belpark residence. 
Room Details
The architectural interior of this residence has been eloquently designed and comes complete with classic furnishings, and beautiful artwork. Just bring a suitcase and move right in because the residence has everything you'll need. Enjoy the stunning view overlooking the North Shore mountains and the Langara Golf Course from your dining and living room. 
Kitchen
All the custom kitchen cabinets are Italian designed for efficiency. The European kitchen appliances are top-of-the-line Gaggenau. The efficient combo steam and wall ovens compliÂ­ment the stainless-steel gas cooktop range with overhead fan. The kitchen features an 'instant hot water' faucet as well. 
Bedrooms
The Master bedroom has unobstructed views and has a queen size bed, end tables, chest of drawers, and a credenza with a wall mounted TV. It has a large walk in closet with built in cabinets, ensuite with soaker tub, rain shower, dual vanity sinks, and plenty of cabinet space. The entire bathroom has temperaÂ­ture-controlled heated floors. The second bedroom contains a queen size bed, end tables, chest of drawers and a large walk in closet which has custom built cabinets for convenience and storage. This bedroom is adjacent to a 4-piece bathroom with a full-size shower and heated flooring. The flex room/den has a hide-a-bed which can be used as an office or guest room which is across from a full-size bathroom. 
Laundry
The full size, front loading washer and dryer are for space efficiency and convenience. 
Extras
There is an outdoor, corner patio with furniture off the kitchen which has stunning views of the North Shore mountains, Langara golf course and the surrounding walking paths. 
The Neighborhood
Vancouver's Westside has long been a highly sought-after area. to call home. Belpark offers a perfect setting to explore the city. From a quiet location surrounded by greenery, you're just minutes from the very best the region has to offer. Close connections to downtown, YVR Airport, UBC, Richmond make getting anywhere effortless. Belpark is just minutes from some of the finest shopping in Vancouver such as Oakridge Centre, with premium brands like Tiffany & Co., Harry Rosen, Coach, Apple and more. The new Marine Gateway complex with a Cineplex, banks, T&T Supermarket and more is very close. 
Amenities
â€¢	Premium Concierge Service (English and Chinese)
â€¢	Outdoor courtyard with water feature
â€¢	Billiard table and Mahjong table
â€¢	Gym and Fitness studio

title: ðŸŒ† Brand New Executive Fully Furnished 3 Bedroom Rental at Belpark
amenities: EV charging, cats are OK - purrr, dogs are OK - wooof, furnished, apartment, w/d in unit, no smoking, off-street parking, wheelchair accessible

description:
Please call Jacob at  show contact info
 to book a showing.
This is fully a fully furnished residence. 
Belpark has a spacious lobby with an on-site concierge to greet you in your preferred language. Its an elegant entry to your beautiful Belpark residence. 
Room Details
The architectural interior of this residence has been eloquently designed and comes complete with classic furnishings, and beautiful artwork. Just bring a suitcase and move right in because the residence has everything you'll need. Enjoy the stunning view overlooking the North Shore mountains and the Langara Golf Course from your dining and living room. 
Kitchen
All the custom kitchen cabinets are Italian designed for efficiency. The European kitchen appliances are top-of-the-line Gaggenau. The efficient combo steam and wall ovens compliÂ­ment the stainless-steel gas cooktop range with overhead fan. The kitchen features an 'instant hot water' faucet as well. 
Bedrooms
The Master bedroom has unobstructed views and has a queen size bed, end tables, chest of drawers, and a credenza with a wall mounted TV. It has a large walk in closet with built in cabinets, ensuite with soaker tub, rain shower, dual vanity sinks, and plenty of cabinet space. The entire bathroom has temperaÂ­ture-controlled heated floors. The second bedroom contains a queen size bed, end tables, chest of drawers and a large walk in closet which has custom built cabinets for convenience and storage. This bedroom is adjacent to a 4-piece bathroom with a full-size shower and heated flooring. The flex room/den has a hide-a-bed which can be used as an office or guest room which is across from a full-size bathroom. 
Laundry
The full size, front loading washer and dryer are for space efficiency and convenience. 
Extras
There is an outdoor, corner patio with furniture off the kitchen which has stunning views of the North Shore mountains, Langara golf course and the surrounding walking paths. 
The Neighborhood
Vancouver's Westside has long been a highly sought-after area. to call home. Belpark offers a perfect setting to explore the city. From a quiet location surrounded by greenery, you're just minutes from the very best the region has to offer. Close connections to downtown, YVR Airport, UBC, Richmond make getting anywhere effortless. Belpark is just minutes from some of the finest shopping in Vancouver such as Oakridge Centre, with premium brands like Tiffany & Co., Harry Rosen, Coach, Apple and more. The new Marine Gateway complex with a Cineplex, banks, T&T Supermarket and more is very close. 
Amenities
â€¢	Premium Concierge Service (English and Chinese)
â€¢	Outdoor courtyard with water feature
â€¢	Billiard table and Mahjong table
â€¢	Gym and Fitness studio
â€¢	In-Suite Laundry
â€¢	Indoor private lounges for parties
â€¢	 2 parking stalls
â€¢	Electric car charging 220 volts electrical
â€¢	 Storage locker and bicycle storage
â€¢	Close to public and private schools
â€¢	 Wheelchair Access

description:
Charming and classic Shaughnessy home sits on a beautiful 64' X 127' (8134 sf )lot. Great street appeal, across from VanDusen Botanical Garden. Cross hall living and dining room. Total of 6 bedrooms and 5.5 baths. Generous room size. Fully finished basement equipped with a huge size game room and sauna for the family to enjoy. South facing solarium off living room. New roof in the double garage, new boiler. Close to Oakridge Mall, Jewish Community Centre. Short walk to Eric Hamber School. This lovely home is looking for another happy and growing family. Call now for your private showing.

* A Classic family house in the prestigious Shaughnessy community
* Very spacious and private. Total 4,622sqt living space on a 8,134 lot with gated entrance. 
* 6 Gorgeous Bedrooms, 5.5Bathrooms, formal living, dining, family room and games room
* Monthly Rent: $4,950 
* Deposit: Half Month of Rent 
* Contract: Min one year

* Pet negotiable; No Smoking

* Available: Immediately
* Location: W37 Ave cross Selkirk St, Vancouver

description:
2 year old spacious 1,519 sq ft penthouse suite on the 6th floor at 41 West concrete building.  Open, bright lay-out with 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 10 ft ceilings. North facing with unobstructed view of North Shore Mountains, Metrotown and South Vancouver from 2 large wrap around terraces up to 900 sq ft in area.  Lovely 300 sq ft private landscaped roof top terrace as well.  Only steps away from Oakridge Shopping Mall and the Canada Line/public transit.  Very exclusive with only 4 suites per floor.  Minutes away from Eric Hamberg, Winston Churchill secondary schools.  King David private school within walking distance.
Location:  655 w. 41rst ave, Vancouver
Features:  in suite lanudry, Miele appliance package gas cooktop/oven, microwave, dishwasher, quartz countertops

                -underground secured 2 side by side parking stalls
               -storage locker; bike storage

description: Fully updated and renovated, CENTRAL South Vancouver home. Perfect for the growing family. 4 Bedroom, 3.5 bathroom with a classic and fully functional layout. Located just steps away from Ross Park, and blocks away from Walter Moberly Elementary. Convenient location, 20 minutes to Downtown, 7 minutes to Richmond, 5 minutes to Langara College. Minutes to shopping / restaurants etc. Complete w/ a double car side by side garage with lane access. Separate basement entry can be easily converted into a suite potential. Just LIKE New house.

description:
Beautiful character house for rent in Vancouver. 2 bedrooms and bathroom on the main floor and 2 bedrooms and bathroom downstairs with kitchen and separate entrance. Laundry facilities. Ideal for 2 families to share. Large deck for summer entertaining. Double car garage with additional parking in front. Fenced backyard with flower garden and a vegetable patch.
Excellent location. 1 block to 2 bus lines, 5 minutes to Langara Canada Line by bus. Walking distance to  John Oliver Secondary, Henderson elementary school and Sunset community center.
Excellent local market shopping and restaurants all around.
Utilities/cable/internet not included.
title: Beautiful character home

description:
AVAILABLE June 1, 2020

3 bedroom, 2 1/2 bath single family home. Basement contains a rec room that could also be used as a bedroom if preferred. Basement bedroom suitable for teenager or extended family, but not to be used as a separate suite. 

Video tour is here:

https://youtu.be/2KNkwiIpz64 

Private driveway parking for 2 cars. 

Expansive back yard with patio on a 60' wide lot in a quiet area. 

Older home with some updating. 

Magee (high school) and McKechnie (elementary school) catchment.

Pets generally OK, but please send details. 

Home can be furnished if desired. Additional costs apply if furnished. Furnishings can include all kitchenware if desired. Utilities are tenant's responsibility. 

Looking for a long-term tenant. Preference given to those signing a 18-24 month lease. 

Absolutely no business activities to be conducted from the home (daycare, homestay, Airbnb, client visits). This is a single family home in a quiet residential neighborhood with no insurance for business activities. 

A credit check and criminal records check is required along with rental references.
title: Westside Vancouver entire house for rent (June 1, 2020) VIDEO TOUR
